content: make a splash with the **hooked on the sea 6 crochet ocean animal amigurumi pattern collection** this fun and playful set includes 6 adorable crochet ocean animal amigurumi patterns made with the signature ** wheat stitch™ 1 ** get ready to be blown away by the **wheat stitch™ pufferfish** a chubby cheerful little amigurumi full of charm and texture this adorable sea creature is worked in the round using the beautiful wheat stitch 2 which adds just the right amount of detail to its bouncy puffy shape with its playful fins sweet little mouth and wide-eyed expression this pufferfish is sure to bring a smile to anyone s face first we ll crochet the side fins tail and that irresistibly cute little fishy mouth and set them aside for later next we ll crochet the body from the top down then it s time to bring your pufferfish to life by attaching the fins eyes and mouth after a quick stuff and stitch to close the bottom your puffy pal is all set to make a splash one of the great things about crocheting amigurumi is the freedom to experiment with any yarn you love from fingering weight to bulky simply adjust your hook size to match your yarn choice and have fun creating all kinds of sea friends a video tutorial is included with this pattern crochet hook g 4 0mm -
